verbose_text: We verified the success of the differentiation process by GFP fluorescence detection and by the analysis of the expression of the pluripotency markers Oct4 and Nanog, and the neural markers Blbp and Nestin by RT-qPCR, at days 0, 1, 3 and 6, which behaved as expected.
evidence: expression of the pluripotency markers Oct4 and Nanog
